name: Keybind Warriors
description:
The Lunch Lounge Studios entry for GMTK Game Jam! 

Play this chaotic, fast-paced, one-hit combat game with friends or family. But your movement is out of control! 



Requirements: 

  • Controller required to play
  • Friend(s) required to play



How to play:

  • Press the colors on your controller to move to the color's direction in the game world. 
  • Jump on top of your friend to win the round. 






Credits:

  • Timo Bron
  • Marvin Damstra
  • Max Wognum
  • Sven de Wit
